Name: Odd Woods
About the game: EXPLORE Explore a living dense forest from abandoned camps to caves. BUILD Use daytime to gather resources and prepare your base for the night. SURVIVE THE NIGHT Try to withstand the attacks of horror creatures in the night. You will face more numerous and stronger enemies every night. HUNT Stay fed and hydrated by hunting wildlife and finding fresh water. PLANT Maintain a balanced diet of proteins and carbs. Since carbs are rarely found in the forest, you have to grow them yourself by planting vegetables.
Meta Title: Odd Woods: Nov 1, 2022, Matt and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Odd Woods? Check out the release date (Nov 1, 2022), developer insights from Matt, and a complete game summary.
